title: Kerala Houseboat Escape with All-Inclusive Dining
description:
Escape to the tranquil backwaters of Kerala with a houseboat stay in Xandari Riverscapes. Sailing along Vembanad Lake and the backwaters of Alleppey, the Xandari Riverscapes houseboats are just what you need to elevate your quintessential Kerala experience. Inducted into the 2019 TripAdvisor Hall Of Fame, the luxury houseboats of Xandari Riverscapes promise a unique and detoxing holiday.

Enjoy your escape with all-inclusive dining with daily breakfast, lunch and dinner, a one-hour cruise in the canals, and one cooking demonstration for two.
